text: (U) omurzandai gunohi gunahkoron, pazirandai tavʙai tavʙakunandagon, saxtuquʙat ast, ʙar kasone, ki dar gunoh cur'at kardaand, ʙaxsandai ne'mat ast, ʙar ʙandagoni itoatkoras. Hec ma'ʙude nest cuz U, ki sazovori parastis ʙosad. Bozgasti hama xaloiq dar ruzi qijomat ʙa sui Ust. Pas, har jakero muvofiqi kirdorason cazoi munosiʙ medihad
